job_tasks.phrase: Samen met het team implementeer je geavanceerde Generative AI applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of building and integrating AI applications, which falls under traditional software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: maar je moet niet bang zijn om ook aan de backend /front-end omgeving te werken.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to traditional backend and frontend development tasks, which are core to software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen met andere ambitieuze full-stack, data engineering, UX en front-end professionals werk je in een gemotiveerd team om Generative AI binnen NS te introduceren.
job_tasks.justification: Working with other professionals across different disciplines to introduce GenAI highlights collaborative development and integration efforts.

job_tasks.phrase: Belangrijke aspecten hierbij zijn privacy en security. Hoe zorgen we ervoor dat NS-medewerkers de technologie veilig en verantwoord kunnen gebruiken?
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring privacy, security, and responsible use of technology aligns with understanding the business context and strategic implementation of AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Je speelt een belangrijke rol in de realisatie van de NS-visie: Samen maken wij Nederland bereikbaar. Voor iedereen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to align technical work with the company's overall vision and strategic goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Het team werkt volgens een Agile/DevOps werkwijze.
job_tasks.justification: Agile/DevOps are methodologies for software development and operations, fitting the MLOps/DevOps category for AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Je schakelt veel met IT collega's, biedt oplossingen en zorgt voor verbetering.
job_tasks.justification: Offering solutions and driving improvements are core software engineering activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Inrichten van de Cloud omgeving voor de Generative AI toepassingen
job_tasks.justification: Setting up cloud environments for AI applications is a key MLOps/DevOps task.

job_tasks.phrase: Afstemmen met Cloud experts die NS breed verantwoordelijk zijn voor de Cloud omgevingen
job_tasks.justification: Coordinating with cloud experts for cloud environments is part of managing and integrating the infrastructure for AI applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van de backend en front-end voor de Generative AI toepassingen
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement of traditional software development tasks (backend and frontend development) applied to GenAI applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Opleiden en coachen van teamleden op het gebied van softwareontwikkeling
job_tasks.justification: Coaching on software development relates to sharing expertise in this core engineering area.

job_tasks.phrase: Opleiden en coachen van teamleden op het gebied van ... Cloud omgevingen
job_tasks.justification: Coaching on cloud environments relates to sharing expertise in managing and operating cloud infrastructure for AI.

soft_skills.phrase: Samen met het team implementeer je
Samen met andere ambitieuze full-stack, data engineering, UX en front-end professionals werk je in een gemotiveerd team
Je schakelt veel met IT collega's

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes software engineering tasks such as backend and frontend development, cloud environment setup, and Agile/DevOps methodologies. While the applications are Generative AI-focused, there are no tasks related to core AI/ML model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG. The role is about building and integrating AI features into software, making it an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is exceptionally clear and detailed, explicitly outlining responsibilities that align well with software engineering practices applied to Generative AI, with no ambiguity regarding core AI model development tasks.
